name: Squarion
description:
A very glowy bullet dodging game.

Dodge bullets in an arena but bullets bounce off the walls, then the arena starts to shrink.

WASD to move.

Escape to return to start screen at any time.

Credits:

Music: Quantum Metanoia by AKMV-18 https://freemusicarchive.org/music/akmv-18/single/quantum-metanoia
